attributes.additional_details:
Gurkiren's father Santokh Singh Loyal and Amrit Kaur  added: "we only want to request to both governments, the Indian government and the British government. There are kindly requesting for their daughter Gurkiren Kaur to  bring their daughter's organs back into this country and they want a further inquiry. What has happened to their daughter?"

This can happen to anyone  - our families and friends.

Are we going to feel safe for medical treatment in India???

From
Chitra Joshi
